title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 557.2 - Casing program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 557.2 - Casing program

State Regulations

Wells used for injection of gas, air, water or other
extraneous fluids shall be cased with safe and adequate casing in such a manner
as to prevent migration, leakage or damage to oil, gas, or fresh potable water
reservoirs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
557.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
